LOL! Nice work here Sec! LOL!!!! I love that you include Nakano-san 
and hai Kondou-san is precious (yes yes I've adopted the guy). 
Nagakura tattling is a hoot... And of course we all know who 
the "Man in black" is. LOL! Love the almost caustic air of this 
piece (including description)...

Oh with Saitou like that, it reminds me of one of my SaiSano 
doujinshi here.. 
http://hajimenokizu.com/doujinshi/album03/Kamata_Koushinkyoku
Although the Saitou in that dj lacks the fear of change and 
insecurity for some reason... hehehe...

--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" 
<secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
> If COPS, Comedy Central's RENO911! and TNT's WANTED all got 
together 
> and had a baby...and gave that baby a sword(s)... it would be 
> Kyoto911!
> 
> set in a strange alternate universe in a hybrid city resembling 
Los 
> Angles, Tokyo/Kyoto, HOng Kong and San Francisco.  The New New 
> Selection Group all live happily in a nearby suburb where they 
share 
> a communal bath (this was suggested by captain Takeda) and to 
build a 
> sense of camaraderie they all have a chance to room with capt. 
Takeda 
> atleast once a week on a rotating basis (this too was suggested by 
> capt. Takeda).
> 
> http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Kyoto911.jpg
> 
> If Kondou looks like he is about to cry that's because he knows 
his 
> men too well.  
> 
> Okita after growing out of the purple hair and pet pig phase moved 
> onto a J-pop look.  
> Itou-sensei originally was recruited to be a military strategist 
> however he prowls the halls of their headquarters in his loose 
> fitting (and tends to fall off during inappropriate moments) black 
> crepe kimono and constantly poses for an imaginary camera.  
> Nagakura has been demoted several times for his tendency to run to 
> Matsudaira Katamori and "tattle" as Kondou calls it.  He currently 
> works at koban (police box) where he gives directions and 
> occasionally holds up a stop sign for children crossing the street.
> Harada was assigned to guard and inspect the docks and search for 
> illegal imported weapons.  Sadly, he has interpreted his seaside 
job 
> as nothing more than a chance to play "lifeguard" for attractive 
> female swimmers.  Occasionally he works overtime by applying sun 
tan 
> lotion on the mentioned attractive females.  Due to the strict 
dress 
> code he was not allowed to wander around in his swim trunks, 
> therefore he adopted an old battered life jacket.
> Hijikata, while at his weekly salon appointment was called on an 
> emergency and thus his hair was burned a nice corn blonde.
> Nakano Takeko is the leader of Aizu's Joushitai (Women's 
Brigade).  
> She was sent by Teruhime, who expressed grave doubts over her 
adopted 
> brother's choice in men for the job, to inspect and report on the 
> Shinsengumi.  Nakano Takeko has realized that her orders and 
> suggestions are taken more seriously if she sports her bullet 
proof, 
> extra shiny, sleeveless body tight armor.
> Lastly, the man Matsudaira Katamori calls to drive him to the 
nearest 
> Starbucks for a green tea Frapacinno is Saitou Hajime. His quiet 
> demeanor is a shield for his shocking insecurity and fear of 
change.  
> Behind his back he is called horrible things like "the unknown MIB 
> agent".  He has refused to cut his long hair because one of the 
new 
> ladies at the emergency switchboard, Tokio an associate of Nakano 
> TAkeko, likes his hair like that.
